What is the cost to register a .vETH subID to launch a currency with a 1-to-1 mapping of an ERC-20, and what cryptocurrency is it paid in?
The cost to register a .vETH subID is 0.01 vETH worth of Bridge.vETH, not a different cryptocurrency like Bitcoin or Ethereum. It's specifically paid in Bridge.vETH.

## .vETH subID
Register a .vETH subID to launch a currency with a 1-to-1 mapping of an ERC-20. The cost is 0.01 vETH worth of Bridge.vETH.

[Learn here how to register a VerusID / subID.](/verusid/verusid-create/)
